title: What is TAPA?
text: TAPA is a non-profit organization focused on improving education, health, and human development in Africa, particularly for women and youth.

title: How does TAPA work?
text: We collaborate with governments, NGOs, and other organizations to provide resources, develop skills, and implement solutions that address pressing challenges in African communities.

title: Who can join TAPA?
text: Professionals, including Africans in the Diaspora, students, and anyone dedicated to contributing to development efforts in Africa, are welcome to join.

title: Where does TAPA operate?
text: TAPA operates across the African continent and has partnerships and affiliations globally.

title: How can I stay updated with TAPA's activities?
text: Subscribe to our newsletter, follow us on social media, or visit our website regularly for updates and new initiatives.
